endpoints.description: Retrieve a list of all connected smart grid devices.
Send customized notifications to specific smart grid devices.
Access real-time data on power quality parameters for the network.
Send operational commands to manage smart grid devices remotely.
Retrieve current and historical fault data within the grid network.
Update the configured load balancing settings to optimize power distribution.
Access historical and real-time usage statistics for analysis.
Remove a specific smart grid device from the network.
Access overall performance metrics of the utilities grid.
Update the maintenance schedule for specific devices or grid areas.
